revision.text:
I started playing PokéClicker almost a year ago when my friend introduced it to me. At the time I knew almost nothing about Pokémon but I have learnt a lot over the last few months. I am not an expert at PokéClicker but I am quickly discovering the mechanics and I hope to discover more things and help the community!
Here is an experimental Petaya setup: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]]
[[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]]

I wondered what was the shortest possible time to grow a berry, and this was what I came up with: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Lum.png|30px]]
[[Lum]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] | || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- style="height: 30px;" | [[File:Lum.png|30px]]
[[Lum]] || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] | || [[File:Lum.png|30px]]
[[Lum]] |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] || [[File:Wacan.png|30px]]
[[Wacan]] | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Lum.png|30px]]
[[Lum]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |}
Here's a possible Petaya setup. It adds a Yache on the top row between the existing Yache on the right column and the Papaya on the central column. It boosts the chance of getting a mutation to 94.5% by extending the lifetime of the Wacan berry but takes away a mutation plot and also messes up the timings. The blue plot is the plot with the extra Yache. Credits to Razrushil#0830 (Discord) for coming up with the idea. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]]
